The vowel /ɪ/ is used across these syllables. In "vi", the /ɪ/ is secondary; in "si", it is likely /ɪ/ or /ə/ (unstressed); in "bi" it is /ɪ/ (primary stress). Therefore, the pair "Visibility, Visibility" has the correct combination of stressed and unstressed /ɪ/ within the repeated word. This addresses the question perfectly.
